    • createMapObjects

      public void createMapObjects()
      Returns a list of all map objects (dynamic, static spatial objects) which were defined in the driving task. Those objects will be added to the objects loaded within the map model.

    • extractVegetationData

      public void extractVegetationData()
      Extracts the path to a text file where all available vegetation objects will be defined, a list of vegetation groups (= objects that may be used randomly together along a road), and a list of OpenDRIVE roads having vegetation aside. For each road, parameters like, range, distance from road reference line and distance between vegetation objects may be specified (optional).

    • getLightList

      public java.util.List<com.jme3.light.Light> getLightList()
      Returns a list of all lights.
      Returns:
      List of lights
